name: American Psycho
description:
A Short game I decided to make based off one of the most Infamous scenes in one of the most Infamous movies ever.

*Theres Swears ooOooo*

Also providing some music to listen to while playing.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S0MA1Azokj0

8-Bit Remix by Lele Cimi79

American Psycho is a property owned by Lions Gate Media
